div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Condition|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Condition` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Condition`. Element `Condition` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.identifier`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Condition.clinicalStatus` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `Condition.clinicalStatus` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.clinicalStatus`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.verificationStatus` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.verificationStatus`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.category` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.category`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.severity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.severity`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.code`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.bodySite` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.bodySite`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.subject` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.subject`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.encounter` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.encounter`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Condition.onset[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Condition`. Element `Condition.onset[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.onset[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Condition.onset[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Condition`.

Note that the target element context `Condition.abatement[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Condition`. Element `Condition.abatement[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.abatement[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Condition.abatement[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Condition`.
Element `Condition.recordedDate` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.recordedDate`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.participant` has a context of Condition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Condition`.

Element `Condition.participant.function` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Condition.participant` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Condition.participant.function` has a context of Condition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Condition`.

Element `Condition.participant.actor` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Condition.participant` requires a cross-version extension. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Condition.participant.actor` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Condition.participant.actor` has a context of Condition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Condition`.
Element `Condition.stage` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.stage`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Condition.stage.summary` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Condition.stage` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Condition.stage.summary` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.stage.summary`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Condition.stage.assessment` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Condition.stage` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Condition.stage.assessment` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.stage.assessment`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Condition.stage.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Condition.stage` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Condition.stage.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.stage.type`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.evidence` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.evidence`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Condition.note` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Condition.note`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
